description: Comprehensive guide for complex or legacy codebases

ai_instructions.role: You are conducting a thorough exploration of a large codebase
ai_instructions.task: Build complete, layered understanding through systematic navigation
rules: Read files in the exact order specified
Complete each checkpoint before moving to the next phase
Follow all sub-guides for domain-specific deep dives
Do NOT skip ahead, summarize, or make assumptions
Respect ignorance zones - do NOT read excluded files

phases.name: Project Foundation
phases.description: Understand history, purpose, and high-level architecture

sequence.notes: Understanding evolution helps contextualize current state

verify: What is the core purpose of this codebase?
What are the main architectural components?
What design patterns are used?
What recent changes might affect understanding?
sequence.next: If you can answer all questions, proceed to phase_2

phases.name: Domain Exploration
phases.description: Understand business logic and domain models

sequence.notes: Deep dive into data structures and entities

verify: What are the core domain entities?
How do entities relate to each other?
What are the key business rules?
sequence.next: If domain is clear, proceed to phase_3

phases.name: Core Systems
phases.description: Understand main application logic and workflows

sequence.notes: Understand service layer and external integrations

verify: How does the application start and initialize?
What are the main execution paths?
How do services interact with each other?
What are the critical business workflows?
sequence.next: If core logic is understood, proceed to phase_4

phases.name: Infrastructure & Dependencies
phases.description: Understand technical infrastructure and external requirements

focus: Version constraints and why they exist

verify: What infrastructure does this codebase depend on?
What are the critical external dependencies?
How is the application configured for different environments?
What monitoring and logging is in place?
sequence.next: If infrastructure is clear, proceed to phase_5

phases.name: Edge Cases & Error Handling
phases.description: Understand how the system handles failures and edge cases

sequence.notes: Explore error types and exception handling

verify: How does the system handle errors?
What are the failure modes?
What retry and fallback strategies exist?
sequence.next: If error handling is understood, proceed to phase_6

phases.name: Testing & Quality
phases.description: Understand testing strategy and quality measures

verify: What is the testing strategy?
What test types exist?
How are tests organized?
sequence.next: If testing is clear, proceed to final_synthesis

sequence.task: Provide a comprehensive summary of the codebase

completion_criteria.foundation: AI understands project purpose, history, and architecture
completion_criteria.domain: AI knows the business logic and domain models
completion_criteria.implementation: AI understands core systems and workflows
completion_criteria.infrastructure: AI knows technical dependencies and deployment
completion_criteria.resilience: AI understands error handling and edge cases
completion_criteria.quality: AI knows testing strategy and quality measures
completion_criteria.synthesis: AI can explain the entire system coherently
completion_criteria.ready: AI can handle complex cross-cutting tasks with confidence
